title: Self-evolving artificial intelligence could transform healthcare, industry and science
description: At the multi-agent level, the framework specifies coordination mechanisms based on decentralized consensus updates and reliability-weighted influence. Over time, agents exhibiting stable collaboration patterns can form “meta-agents” with broader strategic capabilities.
